attributes.action: Put speed markings on the back of fixed cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put a speed indication sign on the back of all existing fixed speed cameras to avoid confusion when road speed limits are lowered/ changed

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HideCameras/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
